column2: p <- p + labs(title = "Degree of Linked Fate Across Racial Groups", x = "Race", y = "Proportion") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5), plot.caption = element_text(hjust = 0))
p <- p + scale_fill_grey(start = 0.2, end = 0.8, na.value = "1", name = "Degree of Linked Fate",labels = c("High", "Moderate", "Low", "None"));p
